text: @afneil See this https://t.co/MqgzPmkTgn ..Few patients had pneumonia," he says, ".. what we saw ... was a serious disruption to the lung's microcirculation." This means ... oxygen exchange no longer works, and explain the difficulties in ventilating CV19 patients in intensive care..
